comments.body: Hi, Personal information is not required for deposits or withdrawals at VAVE. Operations through fiat money sometimes require personal information due to the existing regulations. For us at VAVE we do not perform KYC at all as well as we do not store any personal information about the user. If a crypto-exchanger asks for the KYC, we don’t have access for this information. Option “buy crypto” on our website just redirects you to the crypto-exchangers and you can choose one of them. If you want to save complete anonymity, you can deposit from your own crypto-wallet and in this case we will see only your wallet address and nothing more.Additionally, we need to add that we do not operate in FIAT currencies, and do only in Cryptocurrencies. As KYC procedure applies only if there are transactions in FIAT - we simply have no need for KYC to be there.-----------Note: Copper Membership sounds good to me.
